solution_line_template: Bush is younger than Matt by {age_difference} years, so if Bush is {bush_current_age} years old then Matt is {bush_current_age}+{age_difference} = <<{bush_current_age}+{age_difference}={matt_current_age}>>{matt_current_age} years old
In {years_from_now} years' time, Matt will be {years_from_now}+{matt_current_age} = <<{years_from_now}+{matt_current_age}={matt_future_age}>>{matt_future_age} years old
